remarks.para: May be inoperative for day VMC. May be inoperative for day IMC and night (VMC or IMC) provided that no thunderstorms or other potentially hazardous weather conditions, detectable with airborne weather radar, may reasonably be expected along the route of flight.

note.para: No aircraft shall be dispatched in day IMC or night (VMC or IMC) when current weather reports indicate thunderstorms or other potentially hazardous weather conditions, detectable with airborne weather radar, may reasonably be expected along the route of flight unless approved airborne radar equipment is installed in the aircraft and is in satisfactory operating condition.

operation.para: During daylight hours, when pilot reports or current weather reports indicate widely scattered thunderstorm activity which may be circumnavigated visually, operative radar is not a requirement for the release of a flight.
Although the requirements for operative radar are based on current weather reports, consideration shall also be given to forecasts and other indications of the need for operative radar en route.

numlitem.para: Dispatch not authorized when thunderstorms or other potentially hazardous weather conditions can be detected with airborne weather radar may reasonably be expected along the route to be flown.

note.para: Dispatch allowed when the flight is planned to avoid any potential thunderstorms or hazardous weather.

placard.para: Placard Weather Radar Control Panel (M75) located on P8 panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
